titleStmt.title: A confutation of the tenne great plagues, prognosticated by Iohn Doleta from the country of Calabria, to happen in the yeare of our Lorde, 1587
titleStmt.author: T. R.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue, dwelling without Temple-barre,
